eu_initiatives:
Lighter safety enforcement

section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: The EFLM's aim is to group European lighter manufacturers and European lighter manufacturers’ associations and organizations together with a view to debating and jointly resolving problems with which the industry may be confronted. The EFLM does not aim to make a profit from its activity.
position: Deputy General Manager Lighter Category, BIC group
